meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of a <radical>narwhal</radical> <radical>construction</radical> crew needs all the <kanji>help</kanji> he can get. The narwhals are beginning construction on an underwater city. The leader knows the narwhals are hard construction workers, but they’ll need some help building this city.
readingMnemonic: Then you discover a <reading>saw</reading> (さ) who would be a great big <kanji>help</kanji>. This saw is very strong and would help you and your narwhal construction team out a lot. You should make use of this saw right away.
